headline: Monster Beverage Announces Webcast Details for Annual Meeting of Stockholders
summary: CORONA, Calif., June 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Monster Beverage Corporation (NASDAQ:MNST) announced today that the Company will host a live webcast of its Annual Meeting of Stockholders on Thursday, June 12, 2025. The live webcast will start at 2:30 p.m. Pacific Time. A live webcast of the Annual Meeting can be accessed through www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/MNST2025. For those who are not able to listen to the live webcast, the event will be archived for approximately one year on the Comp
